product_name: The North Face RDT Momentum Jacket - Men's
long_description: Warm and light, The North Face RDT Momentum jacket lets you keep pushing your limits outdoors throughout dropping temperatures and changing seasons. Stretchy polyester fleece features FlashDry(TM) technology to effectively manage moisture and improve drying time so you won't get chilly after periods of intense activity. Rugged, abrasion-resistant woven panels reinforce the collar and shoulders. Zippered chest pocket is designed specifically to hold your digital music player. The North Face RDT Momentum jacket includes two zippered hand pockets.
short_description: Warm and light, The North Face RDT Momentum jacket lets you keep pushing your limits outdoors throughout dropping temperatures and changing seasons.
